title: As Israel Votes, Again, Netanyahu Pins Hopes on the Far Right
description: To regain power, Benjamin Netanyahu, the longest-serving Israeli prime minister, will most likely need the support of Itamar Ben-Gvir, a far-right leader with a history of extreme views.
dc:creator: Patrick Kingsley
media:credit: Avishag Shaar-Yashuv for The New York Times
media:description: Itamar Ben-Gvir during a night walk with supporters on Thursday in Jerusalem.
